name: Narcolepsy (John Santos)
description:
Tired and being forced to clean the house? Can you finish in time before sleep comes to take you? Come play Narcolepsy and race against the call of the bed as you go around finishing your chores.

Created by Horse House

Members:

    John Adriel Santos

    James Gabriel Omalin

    Ian Joshua Nemeño

    Cesar Dominic Mañalac
